metadata.title: CVE-2023-0030 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s nouveau driver in howa user triggers a memory overflow that causes the nvkm_vma_tail function tofail. This flaw allows a local user to crash or potentially escalate theirprivileges on the system.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
